experience.title: experience
experience.description:
Freelance Web Development (Current | Remote & Switzerland)
Offering professional web development services while building real-world experience. I create responsive, modern websites using HTML, CSS, and JS, implementing client requirements from concept to deployment.

AI-Assisted Development
Leveraging AI models as collaborative partners to accelerate learning and code generation while maintaining deep understanding.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description:
Core Web Development: HTML5 (Proficient), CSS3 (Proficient), JavaScript (Intermediate).

Frontend Frameworks: React (Learning), Tailwind CSS (Learning).

Backend & Tools: Java (Beginner), Linux, Git, VS Code.

AI workflows: Prompt Engineering & AI Collaboration.

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description:
Communication & Customer Focus: Clear articulation of technical concepts, prioritizing client satisfaction, and translation of user needs into solutions.

Learning & Adaptability: Self-directed learning, rapid skill acquisition, and embracing challenges as growth opportunities.

Work Ethic: Commitment to quality, attention to detail, and reliability.

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
I'm a driven high school student investing heavily in my future through technology and continuous learning. While I'm early in my professional journey, I combine genuine passion for tech with the discipline I've developed through sports to build a strong foundation in web development.

I approach every project as both a service opportunity and a chance to expand my capabilities.

interests.title: interests
interests.description:
Active Development: Focusing on JavaScript mastery, React development, and backend integration.

Future Goals: Proficiency in full-stack development, acceptance to ETH Zurich Computer Science program, and building a comprehensive portfolio.

education.title: education
education.description:
Currently in High School
Preparing for Computer Science at ETH Zurich.

Actively investing in technical skills development outside formal education. Balancing academics with self-directed learning in web development. Building a foundation for academic and professional success in the tech field.

files.high-school: I'm currently attending NKSA high school in Switzerland. Which is an upper class high school.Focused on techinical subjects like Math, Physics, Chemistry and Computer Science.
files.university: The university i want to go to is ETH Zurich as it offers one of the best education in Computer Science. After i finish high school i want to sign up as fast as possible, as we in switzerland have to go to the army for 1 year after highschool.

sports.title: sports
sports.description:
Athletic Mindset Applied to Development:
Discipline: Treating coding like training.
Persistence: Pushing through frustration and bugs.
Resilience: Bouncing back from setbacks quickly.
Continuous Improvement: Always seeking to level up skills.

favorite-sports.title: favorite-sports
favorite-sports.description:
I am a passionate athlete with interest in many sports like tennis, volleyball and fencing.
In my free time I also like to meet Friends and hang out.
